group_1.textRight: I suppose you still haven’t found out what@makes summer vacation fun.
Oh yeah… Sorry, I forgot that was@the whole point of this.
｜I always have fun with Nemu and her friends.｜

group_1.textLeft: I look for juicy scoops during both summer@and winter.
Maybe the season isn’t what’s really important.

group_1.textRight: The weather outside could be hot or chilly,@but my smile always sparkles!
Seeing other people happy fills my heart up@with sunshine♪
I’m not much help…
But I’m sure you’ll have a fun summer vacation,@Kuroe!
We’ll think of something together!
Ah! I have a great idea!
Kuroe loves reading, so something to do@with books would be fun.
But reading alone does not make a fun summer vacation…
So let’s share recommendations for books@we love!
We can share what we love, and expand@our own horizons.
It’ll also help us get to know each other better.
I think that would make for a really fun summer vacation!
I’ve never done this before, so I don’t know@how it’ll turn out…
For starters, let me lend you a copy of@the Magical Kirin manga!
I just know you’ll love it too!

group_1.textLeft: (I wonder if I’ll be able to love it as much as her…)
(Is it possible for me to be like them?)

group_1.narration: [chara:802000:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]"Let’s put an extra magic spell@on your omelette! Say it with me!@Be super duper yum~my!@Super duper yum~my!"
[chara:800102:effect_shake]"Ugh…too cute…for words…@I can’t speak…@C-can I have my ch-check…please?"
"Lucky, you got Nagitan’s special@service just now, didn’t you?!"
[chara:800301:effect_shake]"Oh man…I’m gonna die now…@I love her so much…true love…@Forever and ever…"

group_1.textRight: Oh, you see, "Phantom Thief Magical Kirin" is…
A shoujo manga I’ve loved for a very long time!

group_1.textCenter: (Something that you can be truly@passionate about…)

group_1.narration: I wasn’t sure at the time…
She recommended it so highly;@I wasn’t sure I could match her enthusiasm.
If I didn’t end up liking it…@what would they think of me?@Would they think I was a snob@for not sharing their interests?
If a rift forms just because we@don’t share the same passions…@We'd be better off not becoming@friends in the first place.

group_1.textLeft: I don’t have a book to share with you right now…@So maybe another time…
Sorry… I really need to go.

group_1.narration: After turning down Karin’s offer,@I left as if fleeing a battlefield.
I hope they couldn’t tell what I was thinking,@while I was running away from their plans.@It was all too overwhelming and troublesome.
They were good people.@If they were in my shoes,@maybe they could have spoken up @about their fears and insecurities.
If I had befriended Karin,@I could have made even more@friends who loved books…
But I left so quickly that I forgot@to grab her number.
I don’t fit in anywhere.@And that’s okay, because I like being alone.

group_1.textCenter: Why? Why am I always like this?
